content: this is the original pattern from 2014 an improved one might be posted later tip jars paypal craftasaurustex@gmail com cashapp $craftasaurustex patreon craftasaurustex 1 1 https //www patreon com/craftasaurustex formerly nichole s nerdy knots social media @craftasaurustex ------------------------------- detailed pattern with 23 large pictures please contact me if you have any questions finished he is about 18in 45cm long with a wing span of over 24in 61cm to get that size if you want to check your gauge his starting head pieces were about 4in 10cm across
